summary: Accountant/Business Consultant Objectives; Dynamic, creative and proactive Accountant seeking a long-term opportunity within the business community, where my professional, experience, education, and abilities would be advantageous to the growth of my employer and my self.

experience.title: Assistant Accountant
experience.company: Government of the Republic of Zambia
experience.description: Closing of monthly accounts and preparing financial statements; scrutinizing source documents for completeness, accuracy and validity; extracting details of expenditure, assets and liability from accounting system, preparing worksheets; monitoring expenditure; ensure they remain within authorized levels; examining validity of imprest increase requests; preparing disbursement vouchers; auditing various accounting transactions (payroll, education grants, travel claims); processing payments to vendors; calculating staff entitlements and payroll; reconciling bank statements; approving disbursements up to authorized level; providing guidance and training; verifying staff loans and advances; preparing payroll-related memos; salary data and reports; end of contract gratuity and end of service benefits; responding to queries; monitoring remittance methods; supervising investigations of non-receipts; assisting cashier; reviewing payments instructions; bank/account management; maintaining fixed asset register; assisting with budgeting and financial policy development; Sage Pastel Evolution usage.

experience.title: Bank Clerk
experience.description: Managed controlled stationery (cheque books); addressed customer needs; monthly branch closed accounts; investigated erroneous charges; customer queries; prepared monthly deposits; reconciled suspense accounts; carried out routine office tasks.

experience.title: Cashier
